misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his meticulous approach to the game and unwavering dedication. Representing Hirsala Golf, Miso has participated in 9 past Hector Trophée tournaments, showcasing a consistent presence on the course. He is slated to make his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

A fierce competitor, Miso secured victory at one past Hector Trophée, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Miso's focus remains on the team dynamic and the pursuit of the Hector Trophée.

Off the course, Miso is known for his peculiar attachment to his Miura irons. Rumour has it that he not only meticulously cleans and polishes them after every round but also insists on keeping them by his bedside, leading some to joke that he sleeps with them. This unwavering dedication to his equipment mirrors his commitment to the game and his relentless pursuit of excellence at the Hector Trophée.
